title: Global lemon and lime production 2000 to 2017
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Production in million metric tons. In total the number of data points it has is 18.
Overall Production in million metric tons has increased over the Year.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2006 and 2007.
The highest Production in million metric tons, of value 17.35 was reached at Year 2016
Minimum Production in million metric tons about 11.38 was reached at Year 2000
